arStrings.szText: (PH) Invoke

(PH) {c_label}{u}Ultimate Jaguar{/u}{/c} 
{icon:bullet,1.2} The Jaguar manifests and bounds around the battlefield for {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} seconds, causing {c_number}6{/c} massive novae that each deal {c_number}{payload:PANTHER_NOVA_DAMAGE}{/c} Fire damage.
(PH) Ultimate Jaguar

(PH) {c_label}{u}Ultimate Gorilla{/u}{/c} 
{icon:bullet,1.2} When you activate {c_important}Invoke{/c}, the Gorilla protects an area for {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds, continuously smashing surrounding enemies for {c_number}{payload:FOREST_SMASH}{/c} Physical damage and sending out waves that deal {c_number}[100|%|]{/c} of your Thorns damage. Within the protected area you have {c_number}100%{/c} Block Chance and Block Damage Reduction.
(PH) Ultimate Gorilla

(PH) {c_label}{u}Ultimate Eagle{/u}{/c} 
{icon:bullet,1.2} After a {c_number}[{SF_9}]{/c} second delay, the Eagle swoops through and deals {c_number}{payload:SKY_DAMAGE}{/c} Lightning damage to enemies.
(PH) Ultimate Eagle

(PH) {c_label}{u}Ultimate Centipede{/u}{/c} 
{icon:bullet,1.2} The Centipede emerges and Knocks Down enemies, dealing {c_number}{payload:SOIL_EMERGE_DAMAGE}{/c} Poison damage and applying {c_number}{dot:SOIL_POISON}{/c} Poisoning over {c_number}{buffduration:SOIL_POISON}{/c} seconds. Non-Boss enemies are instantly consumed if their entire remaining Life becomes Poisoned while in the area.
(PH) Ultimate Centipede
(PH) Your Maximum Allegiance is increased by {c_number}[1*100|x%|]{/c} and all Allegiance Generation is increased by {c_number}[1*100|x%|]{/c}.
(PH) Ultimate Invoke
(PH) While {c_important}Invoke{/c} is active, your Thorns are increased by {c_number}[{SF_45}*100|%+|]{/c} and gain {c_number}{SF_44}{/c} Thorns for every {c_number}{SF_43}{/c} Armor you have.
(PH) Harmonious Gorilla

(PH) The Gorilla becomes more fervent, protecting the area for {c_number}{SF_67}{/c} seconds and increasing the radius of its smashes by {c_number}[{SF_68} * 100|%x|]{/c}. While the Gorilla is present, you generate {c_number}{SF_64}{/c} stacks of {c_important}{u}Resolve{/c}{/u} every second and the damage bonus of {c_important}{u}Resolve{/c}{/u} is doubled.
(PH) Exalted Gorilla

(PH) While {c_important}Invoke{/c} is active, the benefits of {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} are doubled. {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} also applies to {c_important}Gorilla{/c}, {c_important}Eagle{/c}, and {c_important}Centipede{/c} Skills.
(PH) Harmonious Jaguar

(PH) The Jaguar imbues you with its fiery hunger, causing a novae to emanate from you whenever it bounds. The damage of all novae is multiplied by your bonus Movement Speed.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[{SF_57} * 100|%x|]{/c}
(PH) Exalted Jaguar

(PH) While {c_important}Invoke{/c} is active, your Maximum Allegiance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_51}*100|%x|]{/c}.  {c_number}[{SF_52}*100|%|]{/c} of incoming damage is nullified at the cost of  {c_number}{SF_53}{/c} Allegiance.
(PH) Harmonious Transcendence

(PH) Allegiance decays twice as slowly while {c_important}Invoke{/c} is active and can be used to cast any {c_important}Mobility{/c}, {c_important}Control{/c}, {c_important}Defensive{/c}, or {c_important}Potency{/c} Skill at the cost of {c_number}{SF_56}{/c} Allegiance.
(PH) Exalted Transcendence

(PH) {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} While {c_important}Invoke{/c} is active, Critical Strikes have up to a {c_number}[{SF_40}*1|%|]{/c} chance to remove {c_number}[{SF_39}*100|%|]{/c} of an enemy's remaining Life. Against a Boss, the amount of remaining Life removed is {c_number}[{SF_41}*100|%|]{/c}.
(PH) Harmonious Eagle
(PH) The Eagle swoops through the original target area {c_number}{SF_54}{/c} additional times, Pulling in enemies and dealing guaranteed Critical Strikes to any enemies in the center of its path.
(PH) Exalted Eagle
(PH) Harmonious Centipede

(PH) The Centipede emerges for {c_number}[{SF_58} + {SF_59}]{/c} seconds and while present, any enemies that are Poisoned when they die send out a swarm of bugs that seek out a nearby enemy, applying {c_number}{dot:UPGRADE_POISON_DOT}{/c} Poisoning over {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADE_POISON_DOT}{/c} seconds to any enemies they pass through.
(PH) Exalted Centipede
